name: Power Clean
instructions: Lower the bar by gradually reducing the muscular tension of the arms to allow a controlled descent of the bar to the thighs. Inhale during this movement.
Simultaneously flex the hips and knees to cushion the impact of the bar on the thighs.
Squat down with the elbows fully extended until the bar touches the floor.
Start over at Phase 1 and repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.
note: Note: This exercise is extremely complex and requires the execution of many phases.
author: https://www.bodybuilding.com
